name: Vigilante 2084
description:
Welcome to 2084. Welcome to a world controlled by TyCorp - a multinational firm in control of the military, police and just about everyone else. You've just escaped with TyCorp's Main Control Disk - a single disk in charge of TyCorp's operations, communications, you name it.

Hack, jump and use any means necessary to escape the TyCorp campus.

Note: The additional Mac version is for Mac users having problems with the main download.

Instructions:

A/D - Move left/right.

SPACE/W - Jump.

W/S - Climb up/down ladder.

E - Use EMP blast (disables turrets and droids for 5 seconds).

H - Hack door/turret.

ESC - Exit to menu.
